name: Vairina Exspecta
effect: [overDress]－Unit in the [overDress] state (You may place it by stacking it on the specified unit instead of normal calling it to (RC))[CONT](RC):This unit gets the original [Power] of all of its originalDress. (Active on opponent's turn too)[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a grade 3 or greater vanguard, if this unit is in the [overDress] state, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +15000/[Critical] +1 until end of that battle. At the end of that battle, put all of this unit's originalDress into the drop. ([overDress] state ends if there is no originalDress)
flavor: Prayers are, a strong will to break through the impossible.

name: Howitzer of Dust Storm, Dustin
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your vanguard is "Heavy Artillery of Dust Storm, Eugene", [COST][put a card from your hand into your soul], draw a card, choose one of your opponent's grade 2 or greater rear-guards, and retire it.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for each of your opponent's open (RC).
flavor: The messenger has been dispatched. Now, let us take down the citadel.

name: Avaricious Demonic Dragon, Greedon
effect: [CONT](VC):If your soul has an "Avaricious Demonic Dragon, Greedon", the number of cards in your damage zone for you to lose becomes seven.[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [COST][Soul-Blast 2 & put four [Stand] rear-guards into your soul], and [Stand] this unit. If your soul has ten or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of turn.
flavor: Ah~, that's not filling at all. Let me have your body as well!

name: Diabolos Returner, Deryck
effect: [CONT](RC):If you are in "Final Rush", this unit gets [Power] +5000. [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Put a rear-guard into your soul], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards for every four cards in your soul, and retire them. Then, if you are in "Final Rush", look at the same number of cards from the top of your deck as the number of your opponent's open (RC), choose any number of units from among them, call them to (RC), and put the rest into your soul.
flavor: This is the greatest chance, to reverse everything.

name: Gravidia Nordlinger
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), search your deck for up to two Meteorite cards, put them into your Order Zone, and shuffle your deck.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put one or more Meteorites from your Order Zone into your drop], until end of that battle, this unit gets [Power] +15000, if you put three or more Meteorite cards into your drop for this cost, it gets [Critical] +1, and if you put five or more, your trigger effects activate twice.
flavor: Pay close attention, to the manifestation of our utopia.

name: Cardinal Draco, Destijade
effect: [CONT](RC):If your World is Dark Night, this unit gets [Power] +2000. If it is Abyssal Dark Night instead of Dark Night, this unit gets [Power] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [COST][retire three Shadow Army tokens], and [Stand] this unit.
flavor: Barrel reboot. Offer it. Your body, and shadow.

name: Heavenly Shock of Distinction, Lagrele
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 2 & Rest] any number of your other rear-guards], and until end of that battle, this unit performs drive checks, and gets [Power] +5000. At the end of that battle, if you [Rest] three or less units for this cost, choose three cards from your hand, discard them, and if you [Rest] one or less units for this cost, choose two cards from your hand, and discard them. (Drive checks occur after guardians may be called)
flavor: This strike entrusted with my conviction is definitely not light!

name: Magic of Objective, Kakarone
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your vanguard is "Hexaorb Sorceress" or "Pentagleam Sorceress", [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at two cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order.[CONT](RC)/(GC):If your vanguard is "Hexaorb Sorceress", this unit gets [Power] +2000/[Shield] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: Teachings from the great master number one! Change your future yourself!

name: Flagship Dragon, Flagburg Dragon
effect: [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and perform all of the following according to the number of attacks you made this turn.・3 or more attacks ‐ Draw a card. ・4 or more attacks ‐ Choose two of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire them.・5 or more attacks ‐ Until end of that battle, this unit gets [Power] +10000, and when your opponent would call cards from their hand to (GC), they must call three or more at the same time.
flavor: Bring the full force of the army. To destroy the target without leaving anything behind.

name: Shadowcloak
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, search your deck for up to one order card and reveal it, and if your drop does not have a card with the same card name as that card, discard the revealed card. Shuffle your deck.[AUTO](RC):When you play an order, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. If it was Alchemagic, choose one of your other rear-guards, and you may return it to your hand.
flavor: Follow your orders dutifully. That is something that will bring joy to you.

name: Stealth Dragon, Fushimachi Madoka
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your opponent's drop has four or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +2000/[Shield] +5000. Then, if it has eight or more cards, this unit gets [Shield] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: The waning moon has risen fully. It is our time now.

name: Blaze Maiden, Ximena
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at seven cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one card with the [overDress] ability from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: Elegant prayers reverberate across the skies, awakening the power of the spirits.

name: Dragritter, Shihab
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[CONT](RC):When you would ride from your ride deck, you can ride with "Put this unit into your soul" instead of "Choose a card from your hand, and discard it".
flavor: The first strike is an honor for warriors! Please leave it to me!

name: Steam Mage, Ashur-da
effect: [CONT](GC):If your soul has seven or more cards, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.[AUTO]:When this unit is retired from (GC), you may put this card into your soul.
flavor: The loss of magical powers must be suppressed to the minimum.

name: Diabolos Madonna, Regina
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you are in "Final Rush", [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put two other rear-guards into your soul], choose a card from your soul, call it to (RC), and that unit and this unit get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Feeling better? Then, I'll be charging in now.

name: Desire Devil, Incane
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you persona rode this turn, [Soul-Charge 1].[AUTO]:When this unit is put from (RC) into your soul for your vanguard's ability, [COST][Counter-Blast 2], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000/drive +1 until end of turn.
flavor: The weak exists to be used. If you feel sore about it, then get stronger!

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Execute Lemonun
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1] &[Soul-Blast 3], choose up to three of your opponent's rear-guards, and imprison them in your Prison. Then, if three or more of your opponent's cards are imprisoned in your Prison, until end of that battle, this unit gets [Power] +10000, and if five or more are imprisoned, it gets [Critical] +1.
flavor: Apprehend them all!! Follow after me!

name: Gravidia Stanner
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your drop and Order Zone have a total of five or more set orders, this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: Creation is always accompanied by destruction. That is the truth of the universe.

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Tra Bouquenvillea
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), choose one of your opponent's unit cards imprisoned in your Prison, and you may call it to your opponent's open (RC). If you called it, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and imprison it in your Prison. (You choose the circle to be called to)
flavor: Let's settle it with a bang!

name: Easerod Angel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top card of your deck, and if it is a unit card, you may call it to a (RC) in the same column as this unit. (Return it to its original spot if you do not call)
flavor: Then, let us be on our way. Follow my lead!

name: Heavenly Incitation Above the Clouds, Blagar
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your hand has four or less cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at five cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one grade 3 unit card from among them, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
flavor: Maintaining the numerical advantage, is the key to controlling the melee.

name: Magic of Revelation, Totris
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one "Hexaorb Sorceress", reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: It will definitely go well. The girl knows that.

name: Aggress Blue Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle this unit attacked a rear-guard, if your vanguard is "Flagship Dragon, Flagburg Dragon", [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and [Stand] this unit.
flavor: I'll say...... The admiral sure gives tough instructions.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Gabregg
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your other unit in the same column as this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn. Choose all of your opponent's rear-guards, and for the battle that this unit attacked this turn, your opponent cannot call cards with the same grade as the chosen units from their hand to (GC).
flavor: Keenly observing from the trees above, it delivers an unavoidable strike.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Enbarr
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) or put on (GC), if your vanguard is "Sylvan Horned Beast King, Magnolia", this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO]Back Row (RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, you may return this unit to your hand.
flavor: Racing through freely, it becomes a swift gale.

name: Blaze Fist Monk, Gyoukou
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your turn, if your vanguard is "Chakrabarthi Divine Dragon, Nirvana", [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor: The prayers will come true. Here, be off. While your heart burns on.

name: Blaze Maiden, Toresa
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a card from your drop with the [overDress] ability, and return it to your hand.
flavor: Receiving the prayer filled with wholehearted efforts, the spirit rises once more.

name: Steel Bullet of Dust Storm, Ethan
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard's attack hits, [COST][retire this unit], draw a card, and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: The roar resounded across the battlefield like a flash of lightning.

name: Twin Strike of Dust Storm, Orlando
effect: [ACT](Soul):If your opponent's rear-guard was retired this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and call this card to (RC).[AUTO](RC):When your grade 3 or greater vanguard attacks, [COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Can you keep up with my movement?

name: Burning Flail Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, [COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: Just being crushed is not going to be the end of this.

name: Best Harvest
effect: Choose one of your vanguards, and until end of turn, it gets "[AUTO](VC):When your opponent's rear-guard is retired during your main phase, you draw a card.".
flavor: Corner the enemies, bring them down, and efficiently raise battle accolades.

name: Diabolos Striker, Bryan
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 2], until end of turn, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000, and if you are in "Final Rush", choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Critical] +1.
flavor: The team's morale is at its peak. There is no doubt in victory again today.

name: Keenly Loodely
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your vanguard is "Master of Gravity, Baromagnes", [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose any number of normal units from your soul, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each card chosen. Return all of the chosen cards to your deck and shuffle it. (Cards from the ride deck are returned to the ride deck face up)
flavor: With a flash from the gleaming demonic claws, life and death reverses.

name: Desire Devil, Boshokku
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Avaricious Demonic Dragon, Greedon", [COST][put a card from your hand into your soul], search your deck for a card with the same card name as this card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[CONT](Soul):During your turn, if your damage zone has four or more cards, the "Avaricious Demonic Dragon, Greedon" on your (VC) gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Without care or concern, it consumes all.

name: Desire Devil, Mucca
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if your vanguard is "Avaricious Demonic Dragon, Greedon", [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 2], choose a card from your soul, and call it to (RC).[AUTO](RC):When your vanguard attacks, if you persona rode this turn, choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Those who lost to the demonic dragon have their appearance changed into Desire Devils.

name: Stem Deviate Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, [COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: Piercing through time, the bullet to confirm destruction is fired.

name: Pandemonium Tactics
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]![Soul-Charge 4]. Then, if you are in "Final Rush", perform all of the following according to the number of cards in your soul.・6 or more cards ‐ Draw a card. ・8 or more cards ‐ All of your front row units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.・12 or more cards ‐ Choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.
flavor: Tactics born from the pinnacle of cunning, confirm their overwhelming lead to victory.

name: Gravidia Barringer
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) or (RC), if you have a Meteorite in your Order Zone, [COST][Soul-Blast 3], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[CONT](RC):If your drop and Order Zone have a total of five or more set orders, this unit gets [Power] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: To protect the promise from before. That is the reason for my awakening.

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Survey Vermillion
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your opponent's card is placed on (RC) from your Order Zone, [Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: The surveilling eye, is always shining with a sparkle.

name: Cardinal Fang, Rayosia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), look at three cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one World card from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. [ACT](RC):If your vanguard is "Cardinal Deus, Orfist", [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & retire this unit], and call a Shadow Army token to your (RC).
flavor: Fangs and claws gleam, producing a deeper shadow within the dark night.

name: Gravidia Orgueil
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks or boosts, if your Order Zone has three or more Meteorites, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], [Counter-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Gravidia. They are the ancient goddess from another planet.

name: Patrol Robo, Dekarcop
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, [COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: Please leave this place to me!!

name: Overcoming an Eternity
effect: (After a Set Order is played, put it into your Order Zone.)Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 2]![CONT]Order Zone:If your order zone only has World cards, the following effects are active according to the number of cards in your order zone.•1 card ‐ Your World becomes Dark Night.•2 or more cards ‐ Your World becomes Abyssal Dark Night.[AUTO]Order Zone:When your Shadow Army token is placed, that placed unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Right here, an unshakeable will and oath is engraved.

name: Knight of Severe Punishment, Geid
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is retired from (RC) for the cost of your card, look at three cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one card with "Blaster" in its card name from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
flavor: To bring down with certainty. That is the reason for the existence of the shadow knights.

name: Magic of Appreciation, Nanaful
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your drive check reveals a trigger unit, [COST][put a card from your hand into your soul], and draw a card.
flavor: If one wishes to receive good fortune, they must also possess the means to make use of it.

name: Drilling Angel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][put a unit card from your drop into your soul], look at three cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one card with the same card name as the card put into your soul for this cost from among them, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
flavor: I'll end it before you can feel the pain.

name: Blade Feather Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, [COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: These wings are not just for flying.

name: Wish for Tomorrow
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1 & reveal a [Critical] trigger or [Front] trigger from your hand]!If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, you draw a card, and put the card revealed for this cost on the top of your deck.
flavor: Breaking through the dark night, and welcoming the blinding radiance of the morning sun.

name: Pride to Protect
effect: (After a Set Order is played, put it into your Order Zone.)Play this with [COST][discard a card from your hand]![CONT]Order Zone:All of your grade 3 rear-guards get "Boost".
flavor: There is no way we can retreat. We shall put a stop to them here!

name: Ascendance Assault
effect: [AUTO]:You may pay "Reveal a "Flagship Dragon, Flagburg Dragon" or "Inroad Shooter" from your hand" for this cost. When this unit is rode upon, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 other than this card], and call this card to (RC).[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your other rear-guards attacks a vanguard, if your vanguard is "Flagship Dragon, Flagburg Dragon", [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Stand] this unit.
flavor: Sometimes in battle, the winner is determined by the number of bullets.

name: Blooming Petal, Caryophyllus
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your soul has no cards, [Soul-Charge 2].
flavor: The land is filled with vitality with every step she takes.

name: High Rate Burst Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your vanguard is "Flagship Dragon, Flagburg Dragon", choose one of your other rear-guards, and until end of turn, that unit gets "[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if it is the first battle of this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and stand this unit.".
flavor: To all who disturbs the order of the ocean, there will be no mercy even if you are dead.

name: Unappeasable Wild Crow
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you played an order card this turn, [COST][discard an order card from your hand], and draw a card.
flavor: All living things are lively feed to them.

name: Aspiring Maiden, Alana
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, [COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: Here! One more crown as a present♪

name: Death-inviting Black-magic
effect: This cost is reduced by [Counter-Blast 1 for each card in your bind zone. (Reduce the total cost if you Alchemagic）Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 4]!Draw two cards.
flavor: Rouse yourself thoroughly. And entertain me.

name: Titlist Dragon, Musashid Armor
effect: [CONT]:The normal ride from hand on this unit by a unit with a different card name is regarded as persona ride too.
flavor: Well-versed in all martial arts, a battle-hardened warrior.

name: Piercing Bullet of Dust Storm, Maynard
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) or (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 2], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire all of your opponent's rear-guards in the same column as that unit.
flavor: That bullet will not stop until it digs deep into its prey.

name: Patrol Dragon, Scoutptera
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit is boosted, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's grade 2 or greater rear-guards, retire it, and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle.
flavor: It is no easy feat to break through. Not while that is watching.

name: Blast Artillery Dragon, Brachioforce
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, [COST][retire this unit], draw a card, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor: Its main body, is the largest shell among all.

name: Blaze Pole Monk, Shakune
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your grade 0 rear-guard attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & retire this unit], and the unit that attacked gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Like this.. And this! Look, you try it too!

name: Flare Scourge Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your rear-guard is placed, if it was an [overDress], this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The raging flames pulsate and burn with greater ferocity.

name: Stun Voltech Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC):If your vanguard's attack hit this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: Roaring fists!! Descending thunder!!

name: Blaze Fist Monk, Tenji
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your rear-guard is placed, if it was an [overDress], you may draw a card. If you drew, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: Nothing will begin by only thinking about it. Seize it with your own hands.

name: Angled Shot of Dust Storm, Alastair
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your opponent's attacking unit is not boosted, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: To challenge me on your own... How naive♪

name: Hunting Bullet of Dust Storm, Cedric
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your opponent has two or less rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Your allies, they are mostly gone. How about you give up too?

name: Deflect Pulse Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if you have a grade 0 rear-guard, this unit gets [Shield] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: I, shall become the shield to protect the weak.

name: Prayer of Resonating Wishes
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Choose one of your vanguards, and until end of turn, it gets, "[AUTO](VC):When your rear-guard is placed, if it was an [overDress], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.".
flavor: A responding radiance, that becomes the hope to save the world...!

name: Ambush Killsmoke
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!If your vanguard is "Heavy Artillery of Dust Storm, Eugene", choose one of your vanguards, it gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle, and at the end of that battle, choose one of the rear-guards that boosted for that battle, and retire it.
flavor: We'll make you fully regret your decision, for forcing us to bare our fangs!!

name: Diabolos Charger, Nate
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[ACT](RC):If you are in "Final Rush", [COST][Counter-Blast 1] &[Soul-Blast 1], and until end of turn, when this unit would attack, it battles all of your opponent's front row units.
flavor: The unstoppable charge dominates the field.

name: Desire Devil, Hystera
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn for each of your [Stand] rear-guards. If your damage zone has five or more cards, it gets [Power] +5000 instead of +2000.
flavor: The evil emotions that have been piling up, become a shriek that splits heads!

name: Diabolos Madonna, Meryl
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, until end of turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000, and if you are in "Final Rush", [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: Of course, you can make the decision now, right?

name: Desire Devil, Acratz
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put from (RC) into your soul by your vanguard's ability, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Aiming for a one-shot, complete turnabout from the brink.

name: Piercing Assistant
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When you [Soul-Charge] by your card's ability, if you persona rode this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card.
flavor: The destination of these blades... I wonder, where will it be?

name: Metallize Erosio
effect: [CONT](RC):If your soul has seven or more cards, all of your opponent's rear-guards in the same column as this unit loses "Intercept" and "Boost", and cannot get them.
flavor: Not just itself. Everything within its vision will be degenerated.

name: Evil Eye of Prohibition, Quen Lu
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Put this unit into your soul], choose one of your rear-guards, and it gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn. Then, if your soul has seven or more cards, your opponent cannot call grade 1 or greater cards from their hand to (GC) for the battle that that rear-guard attacks this turn.
flavor: And thus, you can no longer move.

name: Diabolos Boys, Cyril
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a grade 3, your opponent cannot intercept until end of that battle.
flavor: Ora ora!! Just as senior said!!

name: Diabolos Girls, Belinda
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the beginning of your main phase, if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [Soul-Charge 1], and if you are in "Final Rush", this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: What she attracts is not limited to the gaze of the viewers.

name: Desire Devil, Gouman
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Desire Devil, Boshokku", [COST][reveal an "Avaricious Demonic Dragon, Greedon" from your ride deck], and draw a card.[AUTO]:When this unit is put from (RC) into your soul by your vanguard's ability, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and until end of turn, when your opponent would call cards from hand to (GC), they must call two or more at the same time.
flavor: Be fearful of my strength! Every one of you are weaklings after all!

name: Desire Devil, Yaaba
effect: [ACT](Soul):If your vanguard is "Avaricious Demonic Dragon, Greedon", [COST][put this card into your drop], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: This is the abyssal street of the dark night. The world ruled by the greedy dragon.

name: Desire Devil, Taida
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Within its small body, it holds reckless ambition unfitting for its size.

name: Geo Acceleration
effect: If your soul has four or more cards, [Soul-Charge 1], choose one of your opponent's attacking vanguard, and it gets [Power] -5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: You can't stand up anymore~? How slovenly~♡

name: Cardinal Draco, Stil Juge
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit is boosted by a Shadow Army token, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: Collecting the dispersed energy, and taking aim for the next shot.

name: Gravidia Pribram
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, search your deck for up to one Meteorite card, put it into your Order Zone, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: What is to be feared, is her power to distort gravity and control the planet.

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Cuff Spring
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), your opponent chooses a card from their hand, and imprisons it in your Prison. If it was imprisoned, your opponent draws a card.
flavor: Come on, get to walking now~.

name: Cardinal Draco, Abstrim
effect: [CONT](RC):If your World is Abyssal Dark Night, this unit can attack your opponent's back row units.
flavor: You're next.

name: Gravidia Laigle
effect: [CONT](RC):During the battle that this unit attacks, if your Order Zone has three or more Meteorites, when your opponent would call cards from hand to (GC), they must call two or more at the same time.
flavor: They have been sealed for eons, deep underground.

name: Blitz Interrupter
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & discard a Set Order from your hand], and this unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle.
flavor: The sudden intrusion is also a culture of the industry.

name: Cardinal Fang, Kinetia
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard is attacked, [COST][retire this unit], choose one of your vanguards, and if your World is Dark Night, it gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. If it is Abyssal Dark Night instead of Dark Night, it gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: If there is a need, I shall throw my body out as well.

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Shirer Zenith
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, imprison it in your Prison, and [Soul-Charge 1] for each grade of the imprisoned card.
flavor: The more evil the stars, the fiercer the soul burns.

name: Gravidia Wells
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), look at seven cards from the top of your deck, choose any number of Meteorite cards, reveal them and put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If your vanguard is "Gravidia Nordlinger", [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose up to two Meteorite cards from your hand, put them into your Order Zone, and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: Not picky of the methods. As long as the results are achieved.

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Tear Croca
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your Order Zone has a Set Order, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Even if you cry and beg, it is already too late.

name: Gravidia Dellen
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: We are, the builders that will build our ideal world on these lands.

name: Refablishment Dock
effect: (After a Set Order is played, put it into your Order Zone.)Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]![AUTO]:When this card is put into the Order Zone, draw a card.[CONT]Order Zone:All of your grade 2 rear-guards get "Boost".
flavor: On top of the perfect maintenance, new features are being added on.

name: Neatness Meteor Shower
effect: (After a Set Order is played, put it into your Order Zone.)[CONT]:You may have up to sixteen "Neatness Meteor Shower" in your deck.[AUTO]:When this card is put into the Order Zone, you may [Soul-Charge 1]. If it was put by your vanguard's ability, you may draw a card.[AUTO]:When this card is put into your drop from the Order Zone, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor: All who stand in the way of our ideals, shall be erased without a trace.

name: Heavenly Core of Wonder, Fortitudo
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your unit [Stand] by a card's ability, [COST][[Rest] this unit], choose one of your other rear-guards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Leave this place to me! Go and rampage to your heart's content!

name: Heaven Sent Great Magic, Milmomo
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your drive check reveals a trigger unit, if your vanguard is "Hexaorb Sorceress", [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: If everyone worked together, we can even use such magic!

name: Bullseye Scope, Gaderel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your and your opponent's vanguards have the same grade, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your other rear-guards, and that unit and this unit get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Discerning the vital point in a split second, and administering aid with the smallest amount of medication needed.

name: Heavenly Shield of Encompassment, Felicida
effect: [ACT](RC):If you persona rode this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 2 & retire this unit], choose one of your grade 3 units, and it gets drive +1 until end of turn.
flavor: The unshakeable bond of the Cloud Knights is their greatest weapon.

name: Knight of Heavenly Bullet, Proklis
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Put this unit into your soul & Rest] another rear-guard], look at three cards from the top of your deck, choose any number of grade 3 cards from among them, reveal them and put them into your hand, and discard the rest.
flavor: A competent sniper capable of accurately sniping from any position.

name: Magic of Realization, Kikitsch
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), choose up to one [Critical] trigger or [Front] trigger from your hand, reveal it and put it on the bottom of your deck. If you put a card, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and draw a card.
flavor: Good and bad fortune, you must possess the skill to see through both.

name: Diffuser Angel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][put a card from your hand into your soul], choose one of your vanguards, and that unit and this unit get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The latest weapon that the scientific board has its eyes on, used to burn away antibody-resistant bacteria.

name: Knight of Heavenly Piercing, Esalta
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is placed on (RC) or discarded from hand during your turn, choose one of your back row rear-guards, and [Stand] it.
flavor: Pushing in from the front. It is for that purpose that the back line is needed.

name: Knight of Heavenly Stride, Salire
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & reveal three grade 3 from your hand], choose a grade 3 from your drop, and put it on the top of your deck.
flavor: Give up on hoping that it'll miss!

name: Magic of Starry Skies, Marlna
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][discard a "Hexaorb Sorceress" from your hand], choose a "Hexaorb Sorceress" on your (VC) or (RC), and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: If there is a deity of discarding, then there should be a deity for picking up, too.

name: Removal Angel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][discard a sentinel from your hand], and [Counter-Charge 1] or [Soul-Charge 2].
flavor: Shall I remove it in one go, eh?

name: Knight of Heavenly Release, Hulp
effect: [CONT](GC):All of your grade 3 units get [Shield] +5000.
flavor: I'll slow their progress, even if it is just a little bit......!

name: Light that Shines upon the Truth
effect: Choose a "Hexaorb Sorceress" on your (VC) or (RC), and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle. [COST][Counter-Blast 2], and it gets [Power] +40000 instead of +10000.
flavor: The prophetic abilities to reveal the future, is to reclaim it with the power of humans.

name: Fabricated Dragon of Ruination
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), choose a Normal Order from your drop, and you may play it without paying its cost. (This play is counted towards the number of orders played)
flavor: Through the repeated overlaps of countless deaths, it gained the wings necessary to take off from the seas.

name: Miscreant Beating
effect: [CONT](RC):This unit gets [Power] +5000 for each order card in your bind zone. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: Invaders are not forgiven, you outlaw that has rotted fully.

name: Creed Assault
effect: [CONT](RC):If your rear-guard did not [Stand] by a card's effect this turn, this unit cannot attack.[CONT](RC):During the battle this unit attacked a vanguard, this unit gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: The strongest navy of the nation. That pride will never be extinguished.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Linbur
effect: [CONT]Back Row (RC):All of your back row rear-guards get [Power] +2000. (This unit is included)
flavor: Charge forth!! Go straight ahead without stopping!!

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Barometz
effect: [CONT](VC/RC):This unit cannot attack from the front row.
flavor: The time to relax and rest is also important.

name: Inroad Shooter
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Ascendance Assault", call this card to (RC).[CONT](RC):If your vanguard is "Flagship Dragon, Flagburg Dragon" or "Ascendance Assault", this unit gets "Intercept" and [Power] +2000.
flavor: Roger that, moving to the designated spot posthaste.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Molemora
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your other rear-guard attacks from the back row, [COST][[Rest] this unit], and the unit that attacked gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Watch your step.

name: Carrion Processing
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Bind this unit], choose an order card from your drop, and put it into your hand.
flavor: Betting one's life to meet the orders of the customer, is a paragon for chefs.

name: Prized Trident
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your other unit attacks, if it is the fifth battle of this turn, [COST][put this unit into your soul], and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: This right here is the latest cutting-edge weapon, called the "Electrified Treasured Spear"!

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Hedgc
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your other rear-guard is placed, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: It already knows, where the needles are pointed at.

name: Officer Cadet, Charicles
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: They won't have it their way, not happening on my watch!

name: In Search of an Ideal Far Away
effect: Choose one of your units, and until end of turn, it gets "[AUTO](VC/RC):When your other unit attacks, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.".
flavor: Become strong. For my precious, irreplaceable thing.

name: Hidden in Darkness
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put four order cards from your bind zone into drop]!Choose one of your units being attacked by a rear-guard, and it gets [Power] +20000 until end of that battle.
flavor: The inconvenient truth, is always covered in darkness.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast King, Magnolia
effect: [AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your rear-guards, and until end of turn, that unit can attack from the back row, and gets [Power] +5000. If you persona rode this turn, choose three rear-guards instead of one.

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Seraph Snow
effect: [CONT](VC):During your turn, if one or more of your opponent's cards are imprisoned in your Prison, this unit gets [Power] +10000, and if three or more cards are imprisoned, this unit gets drive +1.[ACT](VC)/(RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose two of your opponent's rear-guards, and imprison them in your Prison.

name: Blaze Fist Monk, Gyoukou
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your turn, if your vanguard is "Chakrabarthi Divine Dragon, Nirvana", [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.

name: Blaze Maiden, Toresa
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a card from your drop with the [overDress] ability, and return it to your hand.

name: Steel Bullet of Dust Storm, Ethan
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard's attack hits, [COST][retire this unit], draw a card, and [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Twin Strike of Dust Storm, Orlando
effect: [ACT](Soul):If your opponent's rear-guard was retired this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and call this card to (RC).[AUTO](RC):When your grade 3 or greater vanguard attacks, [COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Best Harvest
effect: Choose one of your vanguards, and until end of turn, it gets "[AUTO](VC):When your opponent's rear-guard is retired during your main phase, you draw a card.".

name: Piercing Bullet of Dust Storm, Maynard
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) or (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 2], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire all of your opponent's rear-guards in the same column as that unit.

name: Blast Artillery Dragon, Brachioforce
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, [COST][retire this unit], draw a card, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.

name: Blaze Fist Monk, Tenji
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your rear-guard is placed, if it was an [overDress], you may draw a card. If you drew, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.

name: Prayer of Resonating Wishes
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Choose one of your vanguards, and until end of turn, it gets, "[AUTO](VC):When your rear-guard is placed, if it was an [overDress], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.".

name: Ambush Killsmoke
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!If your vanguard is "Heavy Artillery of Dust Storm, Eugene", choose one of your vanguards, it gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle, and at the end of that battle, choose one of the rear-guards that boosted for that battle, and retire it.

name: Diabolos Striker, Bryan
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 2], until end of turn, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000, and if you are in "Final Rush", choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Critical] +1.

name: Keenly Loodely
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your vanguard is "Master of Gravity, Baromagnes", [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose any number of normal units from your soul, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each card chosen. Return all of the chosen cards to your deck and shuffle it.

name: Desire Devil, Boshokku
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Avaricious Demonic Dragon, Greedon", [COST][put a card from your hand into your soul], search your deck for a card with the same card name as this card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[CONT](Soul):During your turn, if your damage zone has four or more cards, the "Avaricious Demonic Dragon, Greedon" on your (VC) gets [Power] +5000.

name: Pandemonium Tactics
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]![Soul-Charge 4]. Then, if you are in "Final Rush", perform all of the following according to the number of cards in your soul.・6 or more cards ‐ Draw a card. ・8 or more cards ‐ All of your front row units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.・12 or more cards ‐ Choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.

name: Diabolos Charger, Nate
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[ACT](RC):If you are in "Final Rush", [COST][Counter-Blast 1] &[Soul-Blast 1], and until end of turn, when this unit would attack, it battles all of your opponent's front row units.

name: Desire Devil, Acratz
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put from (RC) into your soul by your vanguard's ability, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Evil Eye of Prohibition, Quen Lu
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Put this unit into your soul], choose one of your rear-guards, and it gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn. Then, if your soul has seven or more cards, your opponent cannot call grade 1 or greater cards from their hand to (GC) for the battle that that rear-guard attacks this turn.

name: Desire Devil, Gouman
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Desire Devil, Boshokku", [COST][reveal an "Avaricious Demonic Dragon, Greedon" from your ride deck], and draw a card.[AUTO]:When this unit is put from (RC) into your soul by your vanguard's ability, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and until end of turn, when your opponent would call cards from hand to (GC), they must call two or more at the same time.

effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) or (RC), if you have a Meteorite in your Order Zone, [COST][Soul-Blast 3], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[CONT](RC):If your drop and Order Zone have a total of five or more set orders, this unit gets [Power] +5000.

effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your opponent's card is placed on (RC) from your Order Zone, [Soul-Charge 1].

effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 2 & Rest] any number of your other rear-guards], and until end of that battle, this unit performs drive checks, and gets [Power] +5000. At the end of that battle, if you [Rest] three or less units for this cost, choose three cards from your hand, discard them, and if you [Rest] one or less units for this cost, choose two cards from your hand, and discard them.

name: Magic of Objective, Kakarone
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your vanguard is "Hexaorb Sorceress" or "Pentagleam Sorceress", [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at two cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order.[CONT](RC)/(GC):If your vanguard is "Hexaorb Sorceress", this unit gets [Power] +2000/[Shield] +5000.

name: Flagship Dragon, Flagburg Dragon
effect: [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and perform all of the following according to the number of attacks you made this turn.・3 or more attacks ‐ Draw a card. ・4 or more attacks ‐ Choose two of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire them.・5 or more attacks ‐ Until end of that battle, this unit gets [Power] +10000, and when your opponent would call cards from their hand to (GC), they must call three or more at the same time.

name: Shadowcloak
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, search your deck for up to one order card and reveal it, and if your drop does not have a card with the same card name as that card, discard the revealed card. Shuffle your deck.[AUTO](RC):When you play an order, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. If it was Alchemagic, choose one of your other rear-guards, and you may return it to your hand.

name: Stealth Dragon, Fushimachi Madoka
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your opponent's drop has four or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +2000/[Shield] +5000. Then, if it has eight or more cards, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.

name: Blaze Maiden, Ximena
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at seven cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one card with the [overDress] ability from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Dragritter, Shihab
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[CONT](RC):When you would ride from your ride deck, you can ride with "Put this unit into your soul" instead of "Choose a card from your hand, and discard it".

name: Steam Mage, Ashur-da
effect: [CONT](GC):If your soul has seven or more cards, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.[AUTO]:When this unit is retired from (GC), you may put this card into your soul.

name: Diabolos Madonna, Regina
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you are in "Final Rush", [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put two other rear-guards into your soul], choose a card from your soul, call it to (RC), and that unit and this unit get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Desire Devil, Incane
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you persona rode this turn, [Soul-Charge 1].[AUTO]:When this unit is put from (RC) into your soul for your vanguard's ability, [COST][Counter-Blast 2], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000/drive +1 until end of turn.

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Execute Lemonun
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1] &[Soul-Blast 3], choose up to three of your opponent's rear-guards, and imprison them in your Prison. Then, if three or more of your opponent's cards are imprisoned in your Prison, until end of that battle, this unit gets [Power] +10000, and if five or more are imprisoned, it gets [Critical] +1.

name: Gravidia Stanner
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your drop and Order Zone have a total of five or more set orders, this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000.

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Tra Bouquenvillea
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), choose one of your opponent's unit cards imprisoned in your Prison, and you may call it to your opponent's open (RC). If you called it, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and imprison it in your Prison.

name: Easerod Angel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top card of your deck, and if it is a unit card, you may call it to a (RC) in the same column as this unit.

name: Heavenly Incitation Above the Clouds, Blagar
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your hand has four or less cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at five cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one grade 3 unit card from among them, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.

name: Magic of Revelation, Totris
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one "Hexaorb Sorceress", reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Aggress Blue Dragon

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Gabregg

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Enbarr
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) or put on (GC), if your vanguard is "Sylvan Horned Beast King, Magnolia", this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO]Back Row (RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, you may return this unit to your hand.

name: Desire Devil, Boshokku
